Dialogue: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...
They're not Ministry.  They're Snatchers.  They hunt Muggle-borns and blood-traitors for a price.
Harry! Harry!
Riddikulus!
Couldn't do anything about that bit in the back that's always flipping up, could you? Dead annoying --
We know about the Philosopher's Stone!
Krum!!!
Don' you worry.  He'll be 'long soon 'nuff --
Seems strange, mate.  Dumbledore sends you off to find a load of Horcruxes, but doesn't bother to tell you how to destroy them. Doesn't that bother you?
Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.
You heard Ollivander. It's Harry's now.
Mary.  Go home.  Get the kids. I'll... I'll meet you there.  We have to get out the country, understand?
No. I felt weird, though. Like I'd never be cheerful again.
Because nobody asked her. I would have taken her myself if she weren't so bleeding proud.
What does he get a hug for?
Take a bit of toast, mate, go on.
Hermione, no! He's not worth it.
Uhh-um Welcome back, Hermione.
What else? I ran for it. I'm not cut out for this Harry. I don't know what got into me.
-for his discovery of the 12 uses of Dragon Blood, and his work on alchemy with his partner Nicolas Flamel!
Serves her right. She was a terrible singer.
They were after you, mate.  We'd just put everyone in danger going back.

Sorting Hat urged us all to be brave and strong in these troubled times -- easy for it to say -- it's a hat, isn't it?  First Years seemed to enjoy it, though. Wankers. Filch give you the wand outside?
He saved your life.
No, you don't understand -- Oh, bloody hell...
Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --
Of course. You heard him! 'You'll be next Mudbloods,'
C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.
Hermione of course. Come on Harry, why'd you think she wouldn't tell us who she's coming with?
Expellliarmus!
Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny
But I'm your brother!
Look at your tail!
Ancient Runes? Exactly how many classes are you taking?
So...no giants are coming?
Moaning Myrtle.
Really?  Strapping guy like you, you've got a Beater's build, don't you think?  Keeper needs to be agile, quick --
Probably Neville forgotten the password again.
Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?
Well, you fell off your broom.
What do you suppose Dean sees in her?  Ginny.
I smell like my great aunt Tessie. Murder me Harry.
Scabbers, you bit me!
How will we know what it is when we get in there? After all, a Horcrux can be anything.
Let's think. Who do we know who thinks all Muggle-borns are scum?
What are we gonna do? We can't leave Hermione alone with her.
But why the Department of Mysteries?
Shove off, Malfoy.
Been looking for you for ages. Thought we lost you.
I could feel it inside me.  It was warm, like the first sip of a good cup of tea.  And I knew it would take me where I needed to go.
That's me! Only, I'm head boy...and I'm holding the Quidditch cup! And bloody hell, I'm Quidditch Captain too! I look good. Harry, do you think this mirror shows the future?
Spiders! There's... There's spiders. Spiders. They want me to tap-dance. I don't wanna tap-dance!
Fine.  I get it.  I saw you two the other night.  Yeah, that's right.  Didn't know I knew, did you?
And to think I've been worrying about my Potions final.
Uh Harry?
A hundred and fifty.  Give or take a few years.
Alohomora?
Ginny these must be for you.
So I took this and I clicked it and this tiny ball of light appeared.  And I knew.
Scar...?
Listen to the idiot. He's really laying it on thick, isn't he?
Kill us faster?! Oh, now I can relax!
Whose hair are you ripping out then?
He's gone. The snake too.
It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right. Harry, you take the Bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the Queen's side castle. As for me, I'll be a knight.
So.  Did you and Ginny do it?
Hermione, no! He's not worth it.
Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.
They mean every flavour! There's chocolate and peppermint, and there's also spinach, liver and tripe. George sweared he got a bogey-flavoured one once!
Hermione's got nice skin. Wouldn't you say?  As skin goes, I mean.
That's insulting! It's as if they don't trust us!  Dumbledore again!
Packet of drewbals and a liquorice wand.
Leg-Locker Curse?
But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?
Snogging?  Who're you talking about?
I gotta tell you, I'm starting to freak out a bit.
We've got to get off the streets, get somewhere safe.
The sword was stolen.
Hey.  Where's Hermione?
Fred gave me a spell as to turn him yellow. Want to see?
Exactly! Now the whole school's gonna think you're his great- greatgreat grandson, or something.
He's my rat, sir. He's not really a rat. He was a rat. He was my brother Percy's rat. But then they gave him an owl...
Bloody bird's a menace. Oh, no!
Mum fancies him.
It's Levioooosa, not Leviosaaaar.  She's a nightmare, honestly. No wonder she hasn't got any friends!
Hermione! Bad idea. Bad idea.
Six months she hasn't seen me and it's like I'm Frankie First Year. I mean, I'm only her brother.
I don't like spiders What's that?
Yeah, and we're about as near getting rid of it as we are to finding the rest of them, aren't we!
Bloody hell. We/'ll never find him on this.
You said she was making you do lines!
Harry, you've seen the way that bloodthirsty beast of hers... is always lurking about. And Scabbers is gone.
The world's mental.  Come on, drink up.  We've got a Horcrux to find.
Jinxing the broom? What do we do?
I'm fine!
Not exactly leaving the place better than we found it, are we?
So I Disapparated and came out on this hillside.  It was dark.  I didn't have any idea where I was. I just had to hope one of you would show yourselves in the end. And you did.
Ahem. Vera verto!
Luna?
I'm resigning.  After today's match.  McLaggen can have my spot.
